title: What's the best song by Luke Combs? - Quora

response.answer_text: As someone who has been a fan of Luke Combs for a handful of years, I know that there are way more songs out there than Hurricane. Luke Combs is someone who writes his own songs, and you can tell that he's poured everything into each one. Some are funny and some will bring tears to your eyes. I hope Luke has a long and prosperous career. Here are my top 6 favorite Luke Combs songs. I KNOW SHE AIN'T READYLONELY ONETHIS ONE'S FOR YOUUSED TO YOUHURRICANESHE GOT THE BEST OF MEGet Luke Combs Concert Tickets from Ticket2concert.
